item.title: My First Post
item.description:
Welcome

Hi, I’m Jiaju â€” a CS student at Northeastern University. This blog is where I share what I learn about programming, algorithms, and software engineering.

Why I Started This Blog

Writing helps me think more clearly. By explaining concepts in my own words, I understand them better. Plus, it’s a great way to track my learning journey.
